snippet.title: Rubek Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Download LInk 
App store : https://itunes.apple.com/app/rubek/id1120181386?mt=8
Steam : http://store.steampowered.com/app/531740/

Rubek is a minimalist puzzle game. Control a cube to pick up colors and try to reach the exit while figuring out a way to solve the puzzles. Play through 70+ levels of mind bending difficulty and collect stars to compete on the global leaderboards.


Visit our website: http://www.xigmagames.com/

Music by Enrique Ponce: http://www.enriqueponcemusic.com/

Follos us on facebook: https://www.facebook.com/xigmagames
Twitter: https://twitter.com/xigmagames
